safire.data.filters.basefilter module¶

class safire.data.filters.basefilter.BaseFilter[source]¶

Bases: gensim.utils.SaveLoad

passes(fields)[source]¶

Based on the fields, returns True (passes filter) or False (stopped by filter). Used by the __call__() method when the filter is used as a callable (e.g. in VTextCorpus).

Parameters:fields (list) – A list of items based on which the filter decides whether the item passes or not. Internally calls the passes() method, so that it can be integrated without being called directly.
